column4: you should look at the samba howto for sharing files with windows or mac. It's on the wiki page >> https://wiki.ubuntu.com/SettingUpSamba?highlight=%28samba%29
if the files are on the Linux box it doesn't matter what filesystem the files are on if you use Samba.
well you can use a vfat filesystem (fat32) in that case it might be a better solution if you only have a single Linux machine.
